name: Nekogami Ibunroku (dcjam2021 ver.)
description:
Controls

  ZConfirm / ActionWASD or Arrows
MovementQ or ERotate View

Made for #dcjam2021 (Dungeon Crawler Jam 2021)

In 202X the world was experiencing a catastrophic global crisis. Because of this, a cultist group summoned a demonic sorcery in order to bring more cats to our world to make people happy, but the overpopulation resulted in the world colapsing.

Credits:

100% Created by Thiago Yasue :)

Engine: Unity

Art: Piskel, Photoshop

Sound: Audacity and LMMS

Bugs:

  • During the Map Transition, sometimes you can move as you were already in the map.
  • Combat on Underground Lab - 03 may bug interface due to the speed to click on the slider when performing an action (only a visual bug, not affecting the code performance)

Gamejam Rules Resolution:

>First Person Exploration

>Explorable locations (Your House,  James's House, Lab U-1, Lab U-2, Lab U-3, Lab)

>Instant step movement on a grid

>Rotation in 90º turns in the cardinal direction.

>Player Controller

>Player has Health Points / Cats have mistrustfulness points

>You can die if you lose your health points :(

>You recover your HPs after leveling up. You lose HP when you get attacked. Level influences your stats. You have: Strength (increases damage to mistrustfulness points), Luck (increases chances to escape, decreases chance to get attacked), Dexterity (increases chances to escape), Agility (decreases action sliderbar's speed).

>You need to remove all mistrustfulness points of cats to get their ids. Cats may attack, counterattack, run or do nothing.

>Theme: Cats :o
